title: What Covid-19 is like in Bahrain?
description: Bahrain, a tiny Middle East country, has one of the highest vaccine coverage rate around the world!
contents:
My first experiences in Bahrain
Bahrain was only a really unfamiliar country name for me until I received a job opportunity as a project manager that had to travel to Bahrain in 2018. It has been three years since I went to Bahrain, but I still remember the heat, the desert and the hospitality that Bahrainis has offered me. I didn’t get to spend a lot of time traveling around, especially because it was the fasting season when I went that I didn’t even have the chance to really enjoy the food there. However, it was one of the special places that I have ever been.
This is the photo of a lamp shop that I took in the market:



Bahrain was one of the hottest country that I have ever been that it hit 43 when I was there. I still remember how hot my glasses frame was, and it was also really sandy!
(I took this picture from the hotel window)



How Covid-19 hit Bahrain
Pandemic hit the entire world since 2020, even for the small countries like Bahrain.









This is the total cumulative cases in the world and also in Bahrain for comparison.

title: Welcome to Janice's Blog
description: Welcome to Janice's Blog. I hope to tell the stories which resonate with you!
